name: Thrall
title: Warchief of the Horde
description: Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain.

role.name: Assassin
role.description: Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain.

abilities.name: Chain Lightning
abilities.description: Shock an enemy with lightning, dealing 178 damage. The lightning then bounces 3 times to nearby enemies, dealing 89 damage to each enemy hit.

abilities.name: Feral Spirit
abilities.description: Unleash a Feral Spirit that deals 153 damage to enemies in its path and Roots Heroes hit for 1 second. Each Hero hit increases the distance traveled by 25%.

abilities.name: Windfury
abilities.description: Increase Thrall's Movement Speed by 30% for 4 seconds. His next 3 Basic Attacks occur 100% faster and generate stacks of Frostwolf Resilience.

heroics.name: Sundering
heroics.description: After 0.5 seconds, sunder the earth in a long line, dealing 290 damage and shoving enemies to the side, Stunning them for 1 second.

heroics.name: Earthquake
heroics.description: After 0.5 seconds, summon a massive Earthquake that pulses every 4 seconds. Each pulse lasts 2 seconds, Slowing all enemies in the area by 50%, and deals 50 damage to enemy Heroes. Does 3 pulses.

original.name: Thrall
original.title: Warchief of the Horde
original.description: As a child, Thrall served the cruel Aedelas Blackmoore as a slave. After gaining his freedom, he guided the liberated orcs to a land of their own and worked to recover their ancient traditions. Now and forever he is the Warchief of the Horde.
original.shortDescription: A Bruiser who can hold his own in a lane of battle.

baseHeroInfo.name: Thrall
baseHeroInfo.title: Warchief of the Horde
baseHeroInfo.description: As a child, Thrall served the cruel Aedelas Blackmoore as a slave. After gaining his freedom, he guided the liberated orcs to a land of their own and worked to recover their ancient traditions. Now and forever he is the Warchief of the Horde.
baseHeroInfo.shortDescription: A Bruiser who can hold his own in a lane of battle.

role.name: Assassin
role.description: Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain.

trait.name: Frostwolf Resilience
trait.description: Dealing damage with Abilities grants 1 stack of Frostwolf Resilience. At 5 stacks, Thrall is instantly healed for 223 Health.

skins.name: Warchief of the Horde
skins.description: As a child, Thrall served the cruel Aedelas Blackmoore as a slave. After gaining his freedom, he guided the liberated orcs to a land of their own and worked to recover their ancient traditions. Now and forever he is the Warchief of the Horde.

skins.name: World-Shaman Thrall
skins.description: The vestments of a shaman should be as simple as the elements themselves. Although, there's no rule about what you wear beneath them.

skins.name: Earthbreaker Thrall
skins.description: The weight of the world hangs upon the Aspect of Earth, a burden no mortal can bear. As Thrall embraced its power, he was consumed by living rock and forever changed.

skins.name: Hellhammer Thrall
skins.description: Go'el, the new Warlord of the Ashwolf clan, lifted the shattered Doomhammer from the Blackrock chieftain's corpse. Of his father's betrayers, only Gul'dan remained.
